content.raw:
Updated with a better way of calling the scene's destructor.

I have found what it looks a little problem stopping gazebo. Some times a got this message after CTRL-C:


```
#!c++

pure virtual method called
terminate called without an active exception
```

It seems that some thread deletes a resource on shutdown but other thread still tries to access the same resource. It happens with different branches and worlds. I'll file a ticket.
